title: Ronny Jackson Is Another Trump Disaster | Christina Hendricks & Gov. Ricardo Rossello
itunes:title: Ronny Jackson Is Another Trump Disaster | Christina Hendricks & Gov. Ricardo Rossello
description:
Controversy plagues Trump's pick to lead the VA, Puerto Rico Gov. Ricardo Rossello discusses post-Maria recovery, and Christina Hendricks talks about her role on "Good Girls."
